overview.en: Nova is a consensus driven content ecosystem based on block chain. We expect to establish a value consensus mechanism through block chain technology, and to provide Token incentives to content creators, screeners, investors and eco-builders.
overview.zh: Nova是一个基于区块链的共识激励型内容生态。我们期望通过区块链技术建立价值共识机制，对内容创作者、筛选者、投资者和生态建设者进行Token激励。
